Container.Name: Missing Trailer Downloader for Plex
Container.Overview: Automatically downloads missing trailers for your Plex movies and TV shows using yt-dlp with Deno support. Runs continuously and checks every hour.
Container.Description:
Missing Trailer Downloader for Plex automatically finds and downloads missing trailers for your Plex library. It uses yt-dlp with Deno support to fetch trailers from YouTube and organizes them according to Plex guidelines.
Features: - Automatically detects missing trailers in your Plex libraries - Downloads trailers using yt-dlp with Deno support - Filters out unwanted genres (concerts, shorts, etc.) - Organizes trailers according to Plex guidelines - Refreshes Plex metadata after downloading - Comprehensive logging - Runs continuously with hourly checks
Configuration: 1. Set your Plex server URL and token 2. Configure your movie and TV show library names 3. Customize genre filters and other options 4. The container will automatically start checking for missing trailers
For detailed configuration instructions, visit the project GitHub page.
